title: Venv project resource
description: Install and manage local packages for a project with venv

envDir.description: A directory to create the environment in.

systemSitePackages.description: Give the virtual environment access to the system site-packages dir.

symlinks.description: Try to use symlinks rather than copies, when symlinks are not the default for the platform.

copies.description: Delete the contents of the environment directory if it already exists, before environment creation.

clear.description: Try to use symlinks rather than copies (default: true).

upgrade.description: Upgrade the environment directory to use this version of Python, assuming Python has been upgraded in-place.

withoutPip.description: Skips installing or upgrading pip in the virtual environment (pip is bootstrapped by default).

prompt.description: Provides an alternative prompt prefix for this environment.

upgradeDeps.description: Upgrade core dependencies: pip setuptools to the latest version in PyPI.

cwd.description: The cwd to create virtualenv from. This allows a relative path to be used for dest.

automaticallyInstallRequirementsTxt.description: If an requirements.txt is available in the cwd, automatically install it when a virtual env is first created.
